symbolText.traditional: 天行健，君子以自強不息。
symbolText.english: Heaven, in its motion, strength. The superior man, in accordance with this, nerves himself to ceaseless activity.

symbolText.traditional: 地勢坤，君子以厚德載物。
symbolText.english: The power of the earth is what is denoted by Kun. The superior man, in accordance with this, with his large virtue supports things.

symbolText.traditional: 雲，雷，屯；君子以經綸。
symbolText.english: Clouds and thunder form Zhun. The superior man, in accordance with this, as in sorting the threads of the warp and woof.

symbolText.traditional: 山下出泉，蒙；君子以果行育德。
symbolText.english: A mountain, and beneath it that for a spring issuing forth form Meng. The superior man, in accordance with this, strives to be resolute in his conduct and nourishes his virtue.

symbolText.traditional: 雲上於天，需；君子以飲食宴樂。
symbolText.english: Clouds ascending over that for the sky forms Xu. The superior man, in accordance with this, eats and drinks, feasts and enjoys himself .

symbolText.traditional: 天與水違行，訟；君子以作事謀始。
symbolText.english: Heaven and water, moving away from each other, form Song. The superior man, in accordance with this, in the transaction of affairs takes good counsel about his first steps.

symbolText.traditional: 地中有水，師；君子以容民畜眾。
symbolText.english: The earth and in the midst of it that representing water, form Shi. The superior man, in accordance with this, nourishes and educates the people, and collects the multitudes.

symbolText.traditional: 地上有水，比；先王以建萬國，親諸侯。
symbolText.english: The earth, and over it water, form Bi. The ancient kings, in accordance with this, established the various states and maintained an affectionate relation to their princes.

symbolText.traditional: 風行天上，小畜；君子以懿文德。
symbolText.english: The sky, and that representing wind moving above it, form Xiao Xu The superior man, in accordance with this, adorns the outward manifestation of his virtue.

symbolText.traditional: 上天下澤，履；君子以辨上下，安民志。
symbolText.english: The sky above, and below it a marsh, form Lu. The superior man, in accordance with this, discriminates between high and low, and gives settlement to the aims of the people.

symbolText.traditional: 天地交泰，后以財成天地之道，輔相天地之宜，以左右民。
symbolText.english: Heaven and earth in communication together form Tai. The sovereign, in harmony with this, fashions and completes after the courses of heaven and earth, and assists the application of the adaptations furnished by them, - in order to benefit the people.

symbolText.traditional: 天地不交，否；君子以儉德辟難，不可榮以祿。
symbolText.english: Heaven and earth, not in intercommunication, form Pi. The superior man, in accordance with this, restrains his virtue, and avoids the calamities. There is no opportunity of conferring on him the glory of emolument.

symbolText.traditional: 天與火，同人；君子以類族辨物。
symbolText.english: Heaven and fire form Tong Ren. The superior man, in accordance with this, distinguishes things according to their kinds and classes.

symbolText.traditional: 火在天上，大有；君子以遏惡揚善，順天休命。
symbolText.english: Heaven and fire above it form Da You. The superior man, in accordance with this, represses what is evil and gives distinction to what is good, in sympathy with the excellent Heaven-conferred.

symbolText.traditional: 地中有山，謙；君子以裒多益寡，稱物平施。
symbolText.english: The earth and a mountain in the midst of it form Qian. The superior man, in accordance with this, diminishes what is excessive, and increases where there is any defect, bringing about an equality, according to the nature of the case, in his treatment.

symbolText.traditional: 雷出地奮，豫。先王以作樂崇德，殷薦之上帝，以配祖考。
symbolText.english: The earth and thunder issuing from it with its crashing noise form Yu. The ancient kings, in accordance with this, composed their music and did honour to virtue, presenting it especially and most grandly to God, when they associated with Him their highest ancestor and their father.

symbolText.traditional: 澤中有雷，隨；君子以嚮晦入宴息。
symbolText.english: a marsh and thunder in the midst of it form Sui. The superior man in accordance with this, when it is getting towards dark, enters and rests.

symbolText.traditional: 山下有風，蠱；君子以振民育德。
symbolText.english: A mountain, and below it that for wind, form Gu. The superior man, in accordance with this, help the people and nourish his own virtue.

symbolText.traditional: 澤上有地，臨；君子以教思无窮，容保民无疆。
symbolText.english: The waters of a marsh and that for the earth above it form Lin. The superior man, in accordance with this, has his purposes of instruction that are inexhaustible, and nourishes and supports the people without limit.

symbolText.traditional: 風行地上，觀；先王以省方，觀民設教。
symbolText.english: The earth, and that for wind moving above it, form Guan. The ancient kings, in accordance with this, examined the regions, to see the people, and set forth their instructions.
